remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is created.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is bound to a data source.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
